name: Block Color Crush
description:
Block Color Crush, a relaxing color matching game. Can you get a high score with increasing speed every time?  Speed, concentration and foresight, you will need it...

Control :
  • Q  ,  change to Red color
  • W  ,  change to Green color
  • E  ,  change to Blue color

Note :  My first release, Hope you like it, cya...
